name: Helpless
content:
Helpless

Source CRB.276

Related @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.bPDAhCFEP5Jvybhg]{Conditions}

You are bound, @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.3iTdt2NRgIyrychR]{sleeping}, @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.lf8pbezocjYIvR9y]{Unconscious}, or otherwise completely at an opponent’s mercy. You are treated as having a Dexterity of 0 (making your Dexterity modifier –5), and melee attacks against you gain an additional +4 bonus (equivalent to attacking a prone target). Ranged attacks get no special bonus against you.
